Address.label: Address
Address.value: AVENUE CHEDID JAFET, 75, TORRE SUL,30TH FLOOR, SAO PAULO, 04551-065, Brazil

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: XP Inc is a Cayman Island-based technology-driven financial services platform. It is a provider of low-fee financial products and services in Brazil. The company evaluates its business through a single segment such as monitoring operations, making decisions on fund allocation, and evaluating the performance. It generates revenue through the Brokerage commission.
